item.description:
Liz tells me that September's Meetup had a great turnout - and I missed it! I hope to make it to the next one, so I'd love to see some of you then!

I think the weather should hold out to go to Salem Willows in October, but if anyone has any ideas of places to meet during the colder months, please email me!!

Thanks!
-laura & Molly

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel October Meetup
